name: Tim's World
description:
~ Tim's World ~ Final Version @madrid2030 

–––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– 

Welcome to another Mobile-Friendly Game by @madrid2030, inspired by @TimMcCool :) Make sure to remix and change skins, or add another theme! Over 2.000 Blocks of Code, and 55+ hours of hard work, madrid2030 Presents: Tɪᴍ'ꜱ Wᴏʀʟᴅ I'm glad to introduce you "Tim's World" Hate comments will be reported. Thanks for understanding this. Also, please don't steal anything from this project without credit!

 –––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– 

~ TurboWarp ~ ▶︎ Play here for no crash or lag! ◀︎ https://turbowarp.org/658181844?interpolate&clones=Infinity –––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– 

~ Instructions ~ 

> Move with arrows keys, wasd or mobile friendly! 

> Shoot with spacebar or click on the player to shoot! 

> Collect coins. 

> Avoid the Enemies, they can spawn on every border 

> Don't touch the laser, you'll die 

–––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– 

~ Credits ~ 

> Code and Art: @madrid2030 

> Player Art: @QuaXX 

> Music: @-Xaf- 

> Inspiration: @TimMcCool 

> Sounds: Scratch and @griffpatch! 

> Intro: @ThePro255 

> Score Engine, Coins Engine + Shop Engine: @Freezing_Blazer 

> Some Code + Suggestions: @CoderOfGod ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––

 Notes: 

1. This took so long to made! It's here finally the Final Version, so it took a lot to made. I would really appreciate some Feedback, love and a fave! 

2. This is finished, but there can be some glitches, so please leave a comment below on any bugs / glitches that you find, and please describe them a bit, so I can know how to fix them :) 

3. I gave credit to everyone, so please don't leave comments as: "You didn't gave credit to ___" because I know that I gave credit to everyone. ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––

Thank you for stopping  by!
